items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 4.2 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 4.2 is here with Rules grouping, support for TLS 1.3, ability to capture gRPC traffic and many more improvements.

items.title: How To Evaluate Then Improve a Website’s Network Performance
items.description: Not sure where to start when it comes to improving your website’s performance? Learn tested techniques listed in this blog, complete with video.

items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 4.1 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 4.1 is here with new features and enhancements to make the traffic inspection and your debugging experience better!

items.title: How To Evaluate Then Improve a Website’s Network Performance
items.description: Not sure where to start when it comes to improving your website’s performance? Learn tested techniques listed in this blog, complete with video.

items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 4.0 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 4.0 is here with a new filtering experience, including ability to save filters, copy requests as different formats and save body to a file.

items.title: How To Evaluate Then Improve a Website’s Network Performance
items.description: Not sure where to start when it comes to improving your website’s performance? Learn tested techniques listed in this blog, complete with video.

items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 3.4 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 3.4 release comes with a new Apple Silicon build, an improved user login experience and Extended Offline Support, and many new highly requested features!

items.title: How To Evaluate Then Improve a Website’s Network Performance
items.description: Not sure where to start when it comes to improving your website’s performance? Learn tested techniques listed in this blog, complete with video.

items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 3.2 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 3.2 release comes with new productivity features and security suggestions added!

items.title: Introducing Preconfigured Browser Capturing in Fiddler Everywhere
items.description: One can now capture HTTP(S) traffic without the need to trust Fiddler's root certificate and change the system proxy.

items.title: Introducing the New Rule Builder
items.description: Build your own Rules out of the box, mark sessions, test web changes quickly, and make the process of debugging and development easier using the new Rule Builder in Fiddler Everywhere.

items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 3.0 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 3.0 release comes with long-awaited features such as HTTP/2, WebSocket support, new Advanced Filters and more!

items.title: Introducing Preconfigured Browser Capturing in Fiddler Everywhere
items.description: One can now capture HTTP(S) traffic without the need to trust Fiddler's root certificate and change the system proxy.

items.title: Introducing the New Rule Builder
items.description: Build your own Rules out of the box, mark sessions, test web changes quickly, and make the process of debugging and development easier using the new Rule Builder in Fiddler Everywhere.

items.title: Introducing Preconfigured Browser Capturing in Fiddler Everywhere
items.description: One can now capture HTTP(S) traffic without the need to trust Fiddler's root certificate and change the system proxy.

items.title: Introducing the New Rule Builder
items.description: Build your own Rules out of the box, mark sessions, test web changes quickly, and make the process of debugging and development easier using the new Rule Builder in Fiddler Everywhere.

items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 2.0 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 2.0 is here and it comes with UI enhancements and new, more powerful features! Plus take a sneak peek of what else we are preparing to introduce next in Fiddler Everywhere in 2021.

items.title: Introducing the New Rule Builder
items.description: Build your own Rules out of the box, mark sessions, test web changes quickly, and make the process of debugging and development easier using the new Rule Builder in Fiddler Everywhere.

items.title: Fiddler Everywhere 2.0 Is Here!
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere 2.0 is here and it comes with UI enhancements and new, more powerful features! Plus take a sneak peek of what else we are preparing to introduce next in Fiddler Everywhere in 2021.

items.title: Fiddler is Getting a New Look
items.description: Fiddler Everywhere is the next generation of Fiddler, and it's getting a new user interface and user experience to make your web and desktop network debugging on macOS, Linux, and Windows even easier.

items.title: A Team Ready Fiddler Experience
items.description: Fiddler is getting a new feature that makes collaborating with others on web debugging easier than ever. Read on to see how you can use it in your teams today.
